archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: BPM systeem
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Een systeem dat het uitvoeren van (bedrijfs)processen ondersteunt.

properties.value: Microsoft BizTalk Server (http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/biztalk/default.aspx), Talend BPM (http://www.talend.com/products/bpm), IBM Business Process Manager (http://www.ibm.com/software/products/us/en/business-process-manager-family), Oracle Business Process Management Suite (http://www.oracle.com/us/technologies/bpm/overview/index.html), Circle Software Verseon Zaaksysteem (http://www.circlesoftware.nl/toepassingen/zaaksysteem/) * Perceptive Software Case Management (http://www.perceptivesoftware.com/products/perceptive-process/case-management) * Be Informed Business Process Platform (http://www.beinformed.com/BeInformed/website/en?init=true)
